text: "Personal Notes of an Infantryman" is a short story by J. D. Salinger. It is about an older man trying to get in the military, and then overseas to combat, despite the obstacles in his way. Collier's published it in December 1942. Category:1942 short stories Category:Short stories by J. D. Salinger Category:Works originally published in Collier's
title: Personal Notes of an Infantryman
